idea-plugin.name: Earth Develop Tool
idea-plugin.description:
Earth Develop Tool: is one of the plugins in the earth series, a development assistant that collects some useful tools needed during the development process.

Earth Develop Tool

English Description

Development assistant, collecting some uncommon but useful tools.

Shortcut: alt + F2 (Windows/Linux) or option + F2 (macOS). You can adjust this in IDEA settings by searching for "Open Toolkit".

  • MyBatis Console Log to SQL: Quickly convert MyBatis output logs into executable SQL statements.
  • Text Encryption/Decryption: Supports encryption and decryption of common text formats such as Base64 and AES.
  • Timestamp Converter: Easily convert between timestamps and standard time formats.
  • UUID Generator: One-click generation of standard UUID strings.
  • JSON Formatter: Supports formatting and compressing JSON strings.
  • Radix Converter: Supports conversion between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal numbers.
  • Image to Base64: Quickly convert image files into Base64 encoded strings.
  • Druid Encryption/Decryption: Supports encryption and decryption functions for Druid database connection pool.
  • Properties Difference Comparison: Quickly compare differences between two Properties configuration files.
  • YAML Difference Comparison: Quickly compare differences between two YAML configuration files.

中文描述

Earth Develop Tool是earth系列插件之一，开发小助手，收录一些开发过程需要用到的一些工具。

快捷键：alt + F2 (Windows/Linux) 或 option + F2 (macOS)，可在IDEA设置中搜索“打开工具箱”进行调整。

  • Mybatis控制台日志转Sql：将MyBatis输出的日志快速转换为可执行的SQL语句。
  • 文本加解密：支持常见文本的加密与解密功能，如Base64、AES等。
  • 时间戳转换：方便地在时间戳和标准时间之间进行相互转换。
  • UUID生成器：一键生成标准UUID字符串。
  • JSON格式化：支持JSON字符串的格式化和压缩功能。
  • 进制转换：支持二进制、八进制、十进制、十六进制之间的相互转换。
  • 图片转Base64：将图片文件快速转换为Base64编码字符串。
  • Druid加解密：支持Druid数据库连接池的加密与解密功能。
  • Properties差异对比：快速对比两个Properties配置文件的差异。
  • YAML差异对比：快速对比两个YAML配置文件的差异。
